text:
Hey Isabela. Late to the party but thought I'd throw in my two cents because I've been fighting with this.

We removed dates to try to mask that a post was a few years old. But then some of the posts were time sensitive (e.g. it talked about how "new" something was) and it only made it confusing not to have publish dates.

We decided to change it to "last updated" and manually control the date. Because there was really no catch-all that worked for all of our posts.

Hey Isabela. Late to the party but thought I'd throw in my two cents because I've been fighting with this.

We removed dates to try to mask that a post was a few years old. But then some of the posts were time sensitive (e.g. it talked about how "new" something was) and it only made it confusing not to have publish dates.

We decided to change it to "last updated" and manually control the date. Because there was really no catch-all that worked for all of our posts.
